itinerary.routeStandard4Day: Porto Covo to Vila Nova Milfontes
itinerary.mapNote: Mira River estuary. White-washed fishing town. 10m.
Wild cliff-top walking. Empty Atlantic beaches. 30m.
Festival town (NOS Alive/Sudoeste). Dramatic cliff cove. 50m.
River mouth beach. Gateway to Algarve. Trail end. 30m.

waypoints.name: Porto Covo (Start)
waypoints.note: Northern trailhead. Whitewashed village. Ilha do Pessegueiro views.

waypoints.name: Praia de Odeceixe
waypoints.note: River-mouth beach divide. North/South Atlantic coast.

waypoints.name: Cabo Sardão
waypoints.note: Wild cape with stork nesting on sea stacks. Rare sight.

waypoints.name: Praia de Amália
waypoints.note: Wild beach between white dunes and Atlantic cliffs.
